title: Loving Hut - Tourist Street
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Chinese, Indian, European, Mongolian
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Each location is individual family owned and operated. Serves food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. Located downtown on tourist street; 7 min walk from Government Palace and one block over from Luna Blanca.
